message: Hello Students, this notice is to let you all know that there will be no classes tomorrow because it is Republic Day which is a National Holiday.
Hello Students, your new time schedule for coding classes has been updated in the Sprint plan. Make sure to go through it once.
Also there will be a coding hackathon happening this Saturday. If you want to register, make sure to give your names to your IA.
We are introducing a new feature for checking your DSA evaluations. This will be furthur covered in tomorrow's Scrum.
We will be having a guest lecture in tomorrow's CSBT session. It is mandatory to attend the session.
